pkgmetadata.longdescription: # curses-toolkit [![pipeline status](https://gitlab.com/OldIronHorse/curses-toolkit/badges/main/pipeline.svg)](https://gitlab.com/OldIronHorse/curses-toolkit/-/commits/main) [![coverage report](https://gitlab.com/OldIronHorse/curses-toolkit/badges/main/coverage.svg)](https://gitlab.com/OldIronHorse/curses-toolkit/-/commits/main) [![Latest Release](https://gitlab.com/OldIronHorse/curses-toolkit/-/badges/release.svg)](https://gitlab.com/OldIronHorse/curses-toolkit/-/releases)Some simple UI elements for curses TUIs## Installation```% pip install curses-toolkit```## Usage
